name: Beyond the surface
description:
A young man who was taken into care after a terrible incident involving his parents had caused him to lose his memories. 

A couple years later he receives a message informing him that his parents have passed away. 

After speaking with his doctor, he soon decides to return home in pursuit of his lost memories. 

The player must overcome the tasks ahead in order to find out about the hidden truth. It appears that not everything is as it seems.
